pdp_listing_detail.p3_summary_title: Private room in a Peaceful Oasis

primary_host.about: I am a massage therapist, 27 year old and I love life
primary_host.name: Avital

sectioned_description.description:
My place is a quiet 4-bedroom house overlooking the Judean Desert and the Jordan Hills. It is a great spot for any guest travelling from Jerusalem to the North, South or the Dead Sea.

We have a cozy patio for relaxing or watching the sunrise. We also have some great restaurants nearby and a number of unique activities in the area (hikes, camels, ATVs, etc.)!

Make sure you make plans in advance so that I can help you with bus schedules.

Free coffee and tea, and if we have some cookies we would love to share them with you.

Available in any way you need

We have numerous parks in the neighborhood and fabulous scenery.

Our bus, the 215 from Binyanei Hauma (across the road from the Central Bus Station), is only every hour or two so please ask for specific schedules.

I live in a gated community so you may have to show some sort of ID when you arrive, and the guard might want to call to make sure.
As you know living in the desert is beautiful and quiet but note that it can make dust, and we like opening the windows...
sectioned_description.house_rules: Our kitchen is kosher. We'll be happy to guide you in using it.

pdp_listing_detail.p3_summary_title: Beautiful home on the dead sea!

primary_host.about: מועצה אזורית מגילות. מיקוד 90656
primary_host.name: Sara

sectioned_description.access: The unit has a  beautiful big private balcony ( 100 m') Overlooking the view of the dead sea and The mountains of Moab.
sectioned_description.description:
Ovnat is a small village by the dead sea. It is a 5 minute drive from the  dead sea shore and 15 minutes from beautiful streams and fascinating trails of Nachal David, Nachal Arugot, Ein Feshkha and Ein Gedi. It is the perfect base for exciting and educational outings in the area, including the first- century Essene village of Qumran and the Herodian fortress on the heights of masada. This apartment is brand new and spotlessly clean.

This  second floor apartment is brand new and spotlessly clean, with two bedrooms, a living room, dining area, kitchenette, and elegant pampering bathroom. One bedroom has a queen size bed and the second has 2 single beds and a few mattresses. The apartment has a  living room, dining area and full kitchen with a refrigerator, toster oven, cooktop and coffee/tea kettle .living room opens to a huge roof terrace overlooking the Dead Sea to the East and the magnificent Judean desert peaks to the West.

The unit has a  beautiful big private balcony ( 100 m') Overlooking the view of the dead sea and The mountains of Moab.

We love meeting new people , and we are available by text, mail, and phone.

Ovnat is a sweet little village, with warm people and beautiful primeval view.

The best way to get around here is a car. You can also use the bus, or a private taxi.

We are easy and flexible, and we will do are best to help  you enjoy your stay!

pdp_listing_detail.p3_summary_title: Cozy Studio - Dead sea - LOWEST AIRBNBN ON EARTH

photos.caption: Great view of Dead Sea from the big window
That you get to see only twice a year here
That's the view of your vaction - Sunset!

sectioned_description.access: You are welcome to use the whole space including the big refrigerator and freezer.
sectioned_description.description:
In the heart of the Judean Desert, opposite the special Dead Sea, a charming and well equipped studio.
Welcome to an unforgettable experience: quiet, close tourist and recreation sites. Ten minutes from the public beach and just half an hour from Masada and Jerusalem.

At -345  meters under sea level that is the lowest Airbnb home in the universe!!!

And, if you are adventurous and are looking for a different experience on the Dead Sea, away from the tourist stops ask us about the secret hike -)

My studio for dance and movement becomes the perfect place for your vacation! 
In the heart of a new and vibrant neighborhood in Ovnat, we invite you to experience a combination of desert, quiet, welcoming people and a comfortable and pleasant stay.
Here you can enjoy a large spacious space, super clean, shower, kitchenette, linen and towels and a tourist consultant who will gladly answer any question (this is my husband :-)

You are welcome to use the whole space including the big refrigerator and freezer.

You are more than welcome to ask me about special attractions along the Dead Sea since what I do for a living is actually tourism consulting.

 if you are adventurous and desire an amazing private Dead Sea experience ask about the hike. It is beautiful and you will be alone floating in paradise complete with mud bath! If you are looking for a different experience on the Dead Sea away from the tourist stops we highly recommend it!

We live in Ovnat, probably the lowest and smallest village you will ever visit. Only 31 families live here at about 341 meters *under* sea level, all are young and kind. 
What we have the most is quiet – lots of quiet!
Please dress appropriately when walking around the neighborhood.

Getting around is made easy by car or by public transportation since the village is close to a main road (90).
You should note that without a car it might be a little difficult since there is no restaurant or grocery store here. The closest store is about 7-minute drive, in Kalia.

Please note that we will be happy to help and give advice on any day of the week.  As religious Jews, we will not be available at all on Fridays (from around sunset), until Saturday (until an hour after sunset). 
We will be happy to give advice when we see each other, but all are cellphones and computers are off for these 25 hours :-)
sectioned_description.house_rules: Please note that we will be happy to help and give advice on any day of the week.  As religious Jews, we will not be available at all on Fridays (from around sunset), until Saturday (until an hour after sunset). We will be happy to give advice when we see each other, but all are phones and computers are off for these 25 hours
sectioned_description.interaction:
You are more than welcome to ask me about special attractions along the Dead Sea since what I do for a living is actually tourism consulting.

 if you are adventurous and desire an amazing private Dead Sea experience ask about the hike. It is beautiful and you will be alone floating in paradise complete with mud bath! If you are looking for a different experience on the Dead Sea away from the tourist stops we highly recommend it!
sectioned_description.name: Cozy Studio - Dead sea - LOWEST AIRBNBN ON EARTH
sectioned_description.neighborhood_overview:
We live in Ovnat, probably the lowest and smallest village you will ever visit. Only 31 families live here at about 341 meters *under* sea level, all are young and kind. 
What we have the most is quiet – lots of quiet!
Please dress appropriately when walking around the neighborhood.
sectioned_description.notes:
Please note that we will be happy to help and give advice on any day of the week.  As religious Jews, we will not be available at all on Fridays (from around sunset), until Saturday (until an hour after sunset). 
We will be happy to give advice when we see each other, but all are cellphones and computers are off for these 25 hours :-)
sectioned_description.space:
My studio for dance and movement becomes the perfect place for your vacation! 
In the heart of a new and vibrant neighborhood in Ovnat, we invite you to experience a combination of desert, quiet, welcoming people and a comfortable and pleasant stay.
Here you can enjoy a large spacious space, super clean, shower, kitchenette, linen and towels and a tourist consultant who will gladly answer any question (this is my husband :-)
sectioned_description.summary:
In the heart of the Judean Desert, opposite the special Dead Sea, a charming and well equipped studio.
Welcome to an unforgettable experience: quiet, close tourist and recreation sites. Ten minutes from the public beach and just half an hour from Masada and Jerusalem.

At -345  meters under sea level that is the lowest Airbnb home in the universe!!!

And, if you are adventurous and are looking for a different experience on the Dead Sea, away from the tourist stops ask us about the secret hike -)

Getting around is made easy by car or by public transportation since the village is close to a main road (90).
You should note that without a car it might be a little difficult since there is no restaurant or grocery store here. The closest store is about 7-minute drive, in Kalia.

pdp_listing_detail.p3_summary_title: Comfortable family unit at the Dead Sea

primary_host.about: My name is Batya Groman, i am married and a mother with 5 children. I am a sociol worker, and very happily devoted and invested in family and profession.
primary_host.name: Batya

sectioned_description.description:
Vacation at the Dead Sea and stay in our private, brand new, comfortable family unit that allows you to experience an exciting closeness to the unique beauty of the Dead Sea. We are located only 10  minutes from kalia beach, 40 minutes from Masada ( to the south) and Jerusalem (to the north).

Our family unit is 25 square meters, with two large comfortable beds, and a loft with 4 mattresses for the chidren to sleep. 
There is a bathroom and a shower, small kichen available for cooking, with a small refrigerator with a carton of milk. 
The unit has a separate entrance, and it's location creats for a family a distinct sense of privacy, with an outside sitting area overlooking the stunning vastness if the Dead Sea.
We are located in a very friendly, small community village.

For questions you can call: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ,
 or send an email: (Email hidden by Airbnb) 

Ovnat is a small village, it is a beautiful  and a very quiet place. We don't have any shop or a restaurant in Ovnat, but there is a shop in Kibbutz Kallya that is 5 min from us, and some nice restaurants in the area.

For getting to us you can drive your car or come with an Egged bus to Ovnat- number: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) from Jerusalem.

Instructions to drive to our unit:
On entering the gate of Ovnat , drive a few meters and then turn left.  You will drive straight until reaching a junction.  Make a left turn and continue to our house #423, the last house on the right.

primary_host.about: We live in a quite village nir the Dead sea. We have a nice one floor house. And we whod glad to host in our house.
primary_host.name: אלקנה

sectioned_description.description:
Our house in the  judean desert nearby the dead sea is  great for families and couples who want to spend a nice and quite weekend or  holiday.
Our inviting house is waiting for you..

Our nice  designed home includes: private parking, a big kitchen and a nice open space in the living room.
4 large badrooms, 3 toilets and a bath. There is a large yard outside with an outdoor eating space in a patio facing the dead sea.

We will be  available on phone during your stay.

Our neighborhood is a walking distance from the dead sea Beach. You can take a walk in the Date plantation near the beach or around the surrounding desert hills.

We live in a Quiet Village, only a short driving distance from national nature reserves like   Enot Tsukim and En Gedi, and a 40 min. drive from Messada and Jerusalem.

photos.caption: The Gallary, watchs over the Living room. Great for Kids. Also a quiet workspace.
Kosher Kitchen, Two Sinks, Double Oven, Two Refrigerator

sectioned_description.access: Usually the whole house, depending on number of guests. If there are 6 guests or less, the small bedroom will be left closed.
sectioned_description.description:
A beautiful and intimate country house, looking over the Dead Sea and in walking distance from it (in the winter). Half an hour drive from Jerusalem, Matzada, Qumran, and close to many natural sweet water sources. Ideal for families- quiet, safe (children can play outside unwatched). The house is Kosher so is appropriate for Religious Jews or Vegans.

We also have a gallery where kids love to sleep, see pictures. It holds 5 mattresses.

Usually the whole house, depending on number of guests. If there are 6 guests or less, the small bedroom will be left closed.

I am almost always available, best to email or send sms. If you are on your way to the house or in it, please call me to recive a quicker answer.

Very quiet neighborhood. Please note the neighborhood is religious, meaning that people staying over over Saturday must behave in accordance (no loud music, etc.).

A car is very helpful in the area.

The price is for 6 people maximum, not including infants (up to two infants, 
 both under 2 years old). Over 6 guests it is another 100 Nis per person per night. Maximum 10 people, including infants.
sectioned_description.house_rules:
- Kosher Kitchen, meaning if you are not fully aware of laws of Kashrut, then either bring your own dishs or stick to a vegan diet... (:
- You are welcome to use the pool during the season, but full responsibility for use is on the guests.

pdp_listing_detail.p3_summary_title: Charming double room in Dead Sea

primary_host.about: Age 40. Psychotherapist. Married with four children. Loves movies, nature and hiking
primary_host.name: Yair

sectioned_description.access: kitchenette (refrigerator and stove top) Plasma 3D TV, working desk, AC, computer and free WIFI.
sectioned_description.description:
Come and experience the Dead sea and Judean desert  in this amazing 2 room 1 Bathroom brand new apartment. Only five minutes away from the near beach, and half an hour away from Ein Gedi and Mesada.
 Beautiful Ocean view from Main Living room.

This bright, sunny, super clean one bedroom unit is Newly renovated, it features a fully equipped kitchenette (refrigerator and stove top) Plasma 3D TV, working desk, AC, computer and free WIFI. The Unit has a separate entrance, and has complete privacy. It is connected to the main house where my family lives.
Double bed in bedroom, and onther double bed in living room. Pack n Play available too. Fresh linens and towels are provided, sleeps up to 5.
Bathroom has brand new Rain head. 
We are located in Ovnat a Beautiful village. 
Located only half an hour from Ein Gedi and Masada and 40 Minute drive to Jerusalem.

kitchenette (refrigerator and stove top) Plasma 3D TV, working desk, AC, computer and free WIFI.

Here, (Email hidden by Airbnb) or ph (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Ovnat is a small and very calm and charming village located in the northern Dead Sea. 
There are several new homes, a few caravans and a high school.  In the village there are religious residents but it is permitted to enter and leave on Saturday. 
There is no mini-market in the settlement but there are kibbutzim next to Mitzpe Shalem, a 10-minute drive away.
The view to the Dead Sea is close and relaxing and fills the soul. The mountains of Edom and the Dead Sea from the front and cliff of the Judean Desert in the back are unique landscape and location throughout the entire area

The best way to get there is in the car, but there is a bus from Jerusalem or from Ein Gedi. The Dead Sea is better in the car, but Masada has a bus

primary_host.about: Hallow to all. We are a couple Esty and Benya (22-23) traveling in days in eastern Europe. Our interest is to see and feel the real life of the people that living in the country's we visiting.we would love to meet and get to know more about the places we staying, more then just what you can see in the streets. We love the country sides more then the big city..we got engaged in end of this October finally after 5 years of relationship. We are planing to get married right after this trip. This trip is actually our honey moon but just before the wedding. Before we started this trip I, Esty, was working at Waldorf kinder garden and Benya is a photographer and also worked as a gardner and in building with wood, decks and more...
primary_host.name: Esty

sectioned_description.access: Our kitchen equipped with Kosher dishes for dairy and meat.
sectioned_description.description:
Our place is close to Jerusalem- 20 min, 45 min from Tel Aviv, 1 hour from the Dead Sea.   
  Great views, restaurants and dining, parks, art and culture, natural springs, forest, mauntain and near the desert.. You’ll love my place because of  The beutiful open views of Israel. very good vibes. Nice design of the House, very cozy and of course its well equipped!. My place is good for couples and solo adventurers.

It is important to note that our lifestyle is Permaculture principles held by.  therefore we use composting toilet and we keep our food leftovers to our garden compost so our geusts are welcome to do so as well while staying at our House. (not must)

Our bus is built out of love and thinking about the environment.
So we tried to recycle and use what we already have. 
Of course it's present in the particular house design and the atmosphere.
we hope anly in a good way :)

Our kitchen equipped with Kosher dishes for dairy and meat.

We live in Bat Ayin. it is a very spaicial small vilige Consisting mainly of artists, crafts workers, alternative therapists...
The residents of the vilige are religious/ guardians of Jewis tradition. 
' will appreciate if our guests respect the character of the place. Its expressed mainly in the weekend (Friday Saturday).

sectioned_description.access:
אתם מקבלים את כל הביקתה, מלאת פרטיות ונעימה, שני חדרי שינה, סלון ומטבח מטופחים, 2 מרפסות, חצר ונוף.
בכל חדר שינה מיטה זוגית, ובסלון ספה שנפתחת גם לשתי מיטות נוחות. סה"כ 6 אנשים על מיטות.
sectioned_description.description:
מקום חלומי.
מקסים בשביל משפחה, רומנטי לזוגות. 
נופים מרהיבים מכל חלון, שבילים עטורים בעצי פרי ונוי, ומעיינות במרחק עשר דק' הליכה.

הישוב 'בת עין' השוכן בגוש עציון, נבנה לפני כעשרים שנה על צלע הר גבוה מאד, ירקרק ויפהפה, עם נוף מרהיב עד לים התיכון.
הישוב שומר שבת וכך גם המתארחים בו. בית הכנסת המרכזי במרחק חמש דקות הליכה.

pdp_listing_detail.p3_summary_title: Incense of Shilo. Calm the soul.

primary_host.about: Grew up in Chicago, 30 years in Israel. Translator, dancer, guide to Ancient Shilo.
primary_host.name: Ncoom

sectioned_description.description:
Pleasant bedroom with fun family. Very quiet neighborhood, with regular bus service to Jerusalem or in other directions.

This is Shilo. Walk to site of ancient Tabernacle. Tours are available, either from me or other guides, in a variety of languages, or you can just go spend time there alone. 

Neighborhood grocery store, green grocer, pizza. Pool open during the summer.

House has WiFi. Community with spirit. With a neighbor we make our own unique wine from Shilo grapes. One of the few wines you can find that adds NOTHING to the grape. Not sulfides, not yeast for fermentation, not wood for flavor. Pure wine. Has won some international prizes.

We are 800 meters above sea level, with beautiful mountain view. Quiet and relaxation. If there is anything we can do to make your stay enjoyable, please ask. Can tell you much about this interesting country, at a very interesting stage of its development. 

Chaia parle aussi le français.

Enjoy meeting guests and talking to them about life in Shilo and Israel

primary_host.about: My partner and I. together with another couple in Dolev built the cabins.  Actually my partner built them and I help prepare them for visitors.  I am a physical education teacher and my partner manages the pool here in Dolev.
primary_host.name: Gayle

sectioned_description.access:
The cabins are located in a secluded area of the village close to the pool.  
The cabins are in walking distance to the grocery, synagogue, bus station and pool.
sectioned_description.description:
We have two wooden cabins, located in a religious, quiet community.  Dolev is located near the city Moddin, which is a half an hour from Jerusalem and Tel-Aviv.  Both cabins are fully equipped with all the kitchen appliances for a religious family.

We have two cabins, one for a couple and the second one is for a family.  The couple cabin has an upstairs loft with a bed and air conditioning.  Downstairs is the kitchen and living room with the bathroom and jacuzzi.    There is also a television and air conditioning.  
The family cabin, has a master bedroom with a bathroom, television and air conditioning.  Upstairs in the loft, there are 10 mattresses for the children,  air conditioning and a television for CD's only. 
 Our cabins are located in a religious community.  There are all the facilities for a religious family to enjoy holidays in Israel.  The pool is open separate in the summer for men and women. 

 צימרים יפהפים לנוף פסטורלי באווירה כפרית ושקטה בישוב הדתי דלב. בישוב בית כנסת,חוות סוסים ואטרקציות נוספות. הצימרים צמודים לבריכת שחייה הפעילה באביב ובקיץ בשעות נפרדות לנשים וגברים. מתאים למשפחות ולזוגות

The cabins are located in a secluded area of the village close to the pool.  
The cabins are in walking distance to the grocery, synagogue, bus station and pool.

We, the hosts, are in walking distance from the cabins.

Since the village is religious, our guests have to follow religious procedures during the holidays and Shabbat and dress modestly while walking around the village.

There is public transportation to Dolev.  At the cabins there is plenty of parking space for your cars. הצימרים בישוב דלב, קרוב לעיר מודיעין במעוצה אזורית מטה בנימין

There are places in the village where you can order food and other facilities like hairdressers and facial treatments.  There is also a horse ranch in Dolev and a bicycle rental in Talmon (village right next to Dolev).   There are also tour guides in the village that you can rent their services.
sectioned_description.house_rules: Smoking is only allowed outside of the cabins.   Our kitchens are kosher.  The village is religious and guests have to follow these religious restrictions (no driving on Shabbat, no lighting fires on Shabbat, no playing music or anything electrical on Shabbat and walking around the village in modest attire).

sectioned_description.access: Our entire garden is yours to roam, pick fruit (in season) at will.
sectioned_description.description:
I am offering a detached cottage in our beautiful garden located in a gated community in the Biblical Judean Hills, a mere 20 minute drive from Jerusalem.  We are a traditional Jewish Family. People from all backgrounds are welcome in our home. I am a gourmet caterer. We offer a traditional Israeli breakfast free of charge. You are welcome to order a dinner or pre-packed lunch.   
We will gladly provide  information and tips on the many attractions in the area.

I offer a unique personal touch, such as organic cotton sheets, option of vegan or vegetarian breakfast.  Local produce used, including self grown fruit and herbs in season.

Our entire garden is yours to roam, pick fruit (in season) at will.

Languages spoken:
English, German and Hebrew

We live in a beautiful historic Judean hills, near many tourist sights, including wineries and great restaurants, and the Herodion National Park.   We can arrange for you Biblical bread making workshops and other unique attractions that are available in the area.

sectioned_description.description:
״The Rock" This is a pampering B & B in Eli, in Binyamin. 

Staying in our apartment  can give you an experience of inspiration, love and creativity. 
With your spouse or as a family or friend, awaits you in a quality time of play, film or fun work from a variety of creative estimates we have to offer.

The place is very pampering and invested to the smallest details. The place is suitable for sleeping and staying for a joint stay and has creative kits to strengthen the connection between the guests.
Meals can be ordered at an additional cost

Ali is a quality and well-kept settlement located in the Binyamin region, mostly religious. The moshav has a swimming pool that operates in the summer, a well-developed shopping center and entertainment venues as well as religious institutions and synagogues.

A 5-minute drive from Eli is the biblical Tel Shilo, a powerful archeological site. There are a number of restaurants and wineries and studios in the area. The distance from Tel Aviv to Jerusalem is about 45 minutes

The apartment is air-conditioned and has a WIFI, TV and all the things needed for the kitchen including oven, fridge, microwave, coffee maker.

sectioned_description.description:
The apartment is ideal for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
It has a great location, very close to Kibbutz Maale Hachamisha and Kibbutz Kiryat Anavim, near a resort of great restaurants and cafe).
Har Adar located in a perfect location to explore Israel, just 5 min drive to Tel Aviv-Jerusalem highway. (Road no.1)
A lot of free parking in the streets beside the apartment.

The apartment is fully renovated, about 50 square meter, a leaving room with kitchen and toilet in the first floor, and a second floor gallery with bathroom and toilet.
The access to the apartment is by stairs.

We are located in a quiet neighbourhood named “Har Adar” a 900-meter high mountain in the middle of Jerusalem mountains and forest. The apartment is in the centre of Israel, a great place to explore the country. The distances for key points are:
Jerusalem – 14 KM
Tel Aviv – 55 KM
Abu Gush – 4 KM
Ded Sea – 51 KM
Nazareth – 137 KM
Eilat – 352 KM
Tiberias – 168 KM
The apartment is located in a separate building that will give you a full privacy, all rooms are in front of the view.

The apartment is just 40 meter from bus station to Jerusalem that arrive every hour (in day time).

Israeli citizens must pay VAT (additional 17%), other guests must send a picture of there passport.

photos.caption: View of the kitchen from the entrance.
View of entrance from the kitchen

sectioned_description.access: The whole apartment is available for the guests' use.
sectioned_description.description:
Located in a small,  quiet suburban neighborhood of Jerusalem,  on a hill overlooking the coast of Israel.   The unit is a two-room apartment just below our beautiful house,  located on the ground floor.  There are two big bedrooms,  a fully functional kitchen,  cozy living room  and dining area, library, study  hall,  patio, and one giant Shower!!!  and of course, Israeli hospitality.

The apartment in the most peaceful environment.  (It's in the Israeli area,  NOT the Palestinian authority ). Free unlimited parking on the street right in front of the apartment. The unit is located 30 minutes from Old City (Jerusalem)  and 40 minutes from Ben Gurion Airport. There is also a bus stop  (no. 187 - to the Jerusalem central bus station)  steps away from the apartment. Recommended to rent your own car!

The whole apartment is available for the guests' use.

I am always happy to help with anything you may need.

Har Adar is a community located in North Judean mountains. Har Adar is carried to an altitude of 880 metres above sea level and can be view on the cities near the Mediterranean.

Bus No. 187 from Platform 2 in the Central Bus Station in Jerusalem to Har Adar. The bus stops by the house and asks the driver to tell you when to get off.

pdp_listing_detail.p3_summary_title: Boutique apartment in the mountains near Jerusalem

primary_host.about:
Hello,
My name is Roi and I'm 43 years old.
I'm married to Hila and we have 3 lovely boys.
I work at the Israeli channel 12 news. Hila is a designer and it was so important for her to design the apartments so warm and nice.
We would be happy to welcome you in our house!
primary_host.name: Roi

sectioned_description.access: You can use the front yard of the apartment, drink your coffee or smoke a cigarette.
sectioned_description.description:
Come and be among the first to enjoy a brand new apartment in the pastoral hill station of Har Adar. This cozy apartment was designed with lots of love, to make you feel the warmth as if it is your own home. It is located on the tallest mountain between Jerusalem and the sea, in one of the most beautiful areas of Israel. Open concept with lots of natural light and view points. This is a prime location, only 25 minutes from Jerusalem, 20 minutes From Hasada Hospital, and 40 minutes from Tel Aviv.

The apartment has 3 bedrooms. It is in the first floor of our house. There is a private entrance for guests, and total privacy inside the apartment.     
It comes fully furnished with everything you’ll need for a comfortable and worry-free stay - 2 double beds,1 double sofa bed, clean and comfy linens and towels provided, shower cabin and washing machine. Equipped kitchen including refrigerator, oven, microwave, and electric stove. Cable TV and free Wi-Fi.

You can use the front yard of the apartment, drink your coffee or smoke a cigarette.

I will be happy to help and guide you during your stay!

The neighborhood is nice and quiet. It is recommended to do walks and enjoy the mountain fresh air and see the amazing view.

There is a bus stop to Jerusalem next to our house. We highly recommend to rent a car during your stay so you can travel freely and see some nice places around this beautiful area.

The supermarket is located in Mevo Hashaked st.
There are good restaurants in Abu Gosh and in Kiryat Anavim which is 5 minutes by car.

photos.caption: OUR SMALL POOL. 6 METERS BY 3 METERS
our childrens bed bed room. two single beds, a chest of draws and clothes cuboard

primary_host.about:
WE ARE A SMALL FAMILY, WE HAVE TWO SONS, DAVID 7,  AND ARTHUR OUR CHRISTMAS BOY ( 25 DECEMBER). 

WE ARE BOTH PROFESSIONALS IN HIGH TEC AND HAVE AN AIR BNB TO MEET PEOPLE WHO LOVE TO TRAVEL LIKE US.

OUR (Hidden by Airbnb) PAGE SHOWS A LOT ABOUT US, (taffannadavidarthur) we are avid sports people. 

SAFE TRAVELS AND SEE YOU SOON.

TAFF AND ANNA
primary_host.name: Taff

sectioned_description.access:
bbq.
pool
sauna.
jacuzzi.
sectioned_description.description:
Our amazing apartment is available for long or short term rent to the right person. 

our small heated pool and jacuzzi, plus a 6 person sauna, are available to our guests, giving the apartment a spa-like holiday retreat.

the open plan kitchen and living room is clean simple and modern, with all new storage, oven and hot plate for cooking.

we have supplied new cutlery and kitchenware enough to host a nice dinner. 
the small shower and bathroom suite is supplied with generous amounts of hot water. 

there are two bedrooms, the master has a king size bed, while the second bedroom has two smaller single beds, there are ample storage and modern airconditioning throughout the apartment.

The lower garden is shady secluded and pleasant to relax in, while at night as the sun sets the upper deck makes for a great view of the sunset over the plains to the west.

sorry NO smoking is permitted anywhere on the property,
we do not allow pets.

bbq.
pool
sauna.
jacuzzi.

As we live upstairs above the apartment we are always available to help you.

Har adar is located 20 minutes from the center of Jerusalem, a sixty minute drive from Tel aviv, 30 minutes from the airport. 

this makes it an ideal place to stay for your work or holiday.

Har Adar. is a small secular gated community, with its own school's shop and post office. 

at the very top of the hill is a viewpoint offering excellent photo opportunities. 

wooded trails for bikes and hikes an off road ride and community clubes provide entertainment.

there are no restaurants here but five minutes away is the town of ABU GOSH. famous for tahini and arabic food.

we recommend a hire car.
there is one bus per hour direct to the city center.

we only rent to visitors from overseas, our house is non-kosher. We want to make sure guests understand, we do not have rules as to what can or cannot be cooked. If you are uncomfortable please feel free to look at alternat locals. 
This is the desert highlands lots of trees dust and a unique climate.
We have cables and adaptors if you forget.
new this year Satalite TV WITH HUNDREDSB OF CHANNELS.
 sory we speak only English. 
OUR SMOKING AND PET RULES ARE STRICTLY ENFORCED.
sectioned_description.house_rules:
CHILDREN MUST BE ACCOMPANIED IN THE POOL AT ALL TIMES. NO GLASS WARE IS PERMITTED IN THE WET AREAS. PLEASE USE THE PLASTICS SUPPLIED. 
NO FURNITURE ON THE GRASS PLEASE.

Our house is God-given, and we are always open for new experiences with any kind of people, who respect our vision.There is one dedicated room for guests and our attic is divided into 3 rooms, that can be arranged and used according to the choice of the guests. Every hosting is organized according to the character of the guests.

sectioned_description.description:
Very quiet and private home with large garden,  located right in the middle between Jerusalem and Tel-Aviv, 10 minutes drive from Airport. Contains Kitchen, separate bedroom, Jacuzzi. Perfect for Observant Jews, Located in a prestigious Orthodox Jewish community.  Everyone is welcome, including four-legged guests.  Prices are flexible, big discounts for longer stays. Possibility for airport pick up as well.

Very quite and relaxing, with garden, flowers and birds. Sauna and Jacuzzi are great after long busy day. We can provide kosher meals, talk to us privately about  it, if you are interested.  WiFi, computer with internet.  Kitchen with all the facilities, cooking stove, microwave, refrigerator, coffee, tea.

We don't bother our guests, they feel total privacy, but we are always around, you can ask us for any help.

Our place is great because of it's location. It's far away from big cities, so it's very quiet, but it's only 20 min drive to Jerusalem, 25 minutes drive to Tel-Aviv and the sea, 5 minutes to Modiin, 7 minutes to the train station.

This community is an Orthodox Jewish community.  No cars are allowed to enter or drive around on the Jewish Sabbath and holidays. People who don't follow these laws usually park their vehicles outside the community and take a short stroll to their cars.

- No driving inside Hashmonai'im during Jewish Sabbath and holidays.
- No loud noise or music during Jewish Sabbath and holidays

We are a 5 minute drive to Modiin and Modiin Illit, both cities with almost 100,000 people each and all the big city amenities.

Quiet relaxing well located 100 sqm (1000 sqf) apartment with lots of storage and all furniture including two reclining leather couches.

Hi speed wireless internet provided. Can help with meal arrangements too.

We are available to help you during your stay.

Great public transportation to Jerusalem and close to Modiin and the train station in Modiin.
Taxi company typically has cars available within 5-10 minutes of your phone call.

Looking for shomer shabbat and kashrut guests only.

sectioned_description.access: There is a big tent with facilities for cooking inside. The tent is great for being and eating together. There is a big garden in the place, where the guests can use. also there is a fire place.
sectioned_description.description:
This place Giv'at Janoah is located in the hills of Itamar in the heart of the Samaria region. It is a place directly in the nature and is meant to host travelers who wants to have a direct touch with the nature. It is good for individuals and for families with this spirit. The place is simple. One room has 4 beds and another place is a tent that we cal wigwam, with a place for 5 people.

The place is good for groups up to 9 people, who love a simple style and love plants and art. travelers who play music will find the place very attractive since the host loves art and music.

There is a big tent with facilities for cooking inside. The tent is great for being and eating together. There is a big garden in the place, where the guests can use. also there is a fire place.

The host likes very much to interact with his guests. During the week the host comes late at night home, but Fridays he's available.

The host speaks Hebrew and Russian, and not too much English. The host is very friendly to guests as he likes very much people coming from different places.
sectioned_description.house_rules: - On Saturdays arrival is possible only at night, because the host keeps the Shabbat.

primary_host.about:
I'm Gila, and I live in the Kibbutz for 13 years, I'm 55 years old, divorced, and my boys are already out of the house. I work in Jerusalem at the Hi-Tec industry, sing at a choir, crafting jewellers and sculptures and working at the garden. P.S
I am not able to receive families with kids under the age of 13, apologies and thank you.
The order as it is placed on the website would not be voided once you arrive.

,,,before payment you need to contact me, to get my approved 

Thank you.
primary_host.name: Gila

sectioned_description.description:
A separate floor of 2 bedrooms, private bathroom and a huge balcony facing the Dead Sea. Here are some more details: 

About the Location:

- 8 min. drive to the Dead Sea beaches (Kalya, Biankini and more beaches)
- 15 min. drive to the mineral mud beaches
- 40 min. drive to Messada, the archaeological table mountain site.
- 10 min. to the the streams and more national parks.
- 5 min. drive to the first restaurant at the area. 

About your Private Floor:

- 2nd floor
- 2 big bedrooms with double bed each
- One private bathroom
- Huge balcony with seating area and great view to the Dead Sea
- T.V
- Wireless internet. 
- Small seating area with coffee and tea and cookies

About the rest of the House:

I'll live on the 1st floor and you are more than welcome to share the kitchen with me, for storage, cooking, dinning and more. You are also welcome to use the garden with the hammock and the swing.  

About me: 

I'm Gila, and I live in the Kibbutz for 13 years, I'm 55 years old, divorced, and my boys are already out of the house. I work in Jerusalem at the Hi-Tec industry, sing at a choir, crafting jewellers and sculptures and working at the garden. Would love to help you around and suggest activities, and of course, to host you here at the Dead Sea.

Looking forward!
sectioned_description.house_rules: For smokers, please don't smoke inside the house, but you are welcome to smoke on the balcony.

sectioned_description.description:
Welcome to Nehara Bamidbar (Nehara in the Desert)
Located on the edge of the desert, with a breathtaking panoramic view, is our suite. Offering tranquility and relaxation and an escape from daily tumult, visitors come to take a deep breath and unwind. The simple, soft contours of the desert horizon are mirrored in the design of the suite and its grounds.
15 minutes from Jerusalem, off the main road descending to the Dead Sea, the suite is spacious and stylish.

Inside, is an alcove with a queen-size bed, adjacent to a Jacuzzi for two and a large washroom with a luxuriousshower. There is also a kitchenette equipped with a Nespresso coffee machine, refrigerator, and a single electric burner. There is a dining area, a family living room with a comfortable sofa which opens to accommodatethree children, a television with an LCD screen and YES cable, free wi-fi, and an air conditioning unit. Airy and light, with a lounge facing the garden and the view, there is access to a large patio and outdoor area

In the community of NofeiPratthere is a synagogue, a mikva, secretariat, postal service, parks, and children’s activities.

The neighboring town of KfarAdumim offers a large swimming pool, grocery shop, and quality meat restaurants. Other fun dining options include a delicious creperie, Pizza Moshe’spizza shop, Kfar Burger, and more.

Hiking and bicycle trails can easily be found around the area of NachalPrat. (NachalPrat also has a mall and there are three springs there: EinShacharit, EinMabua, and EinPrat. Plus, NachalOg, MatzokHahe’etekim, and more.) Appointments can be made for personal guided tours with the host who is a licensed tour guide.

ATVrides, field trips, desert hospitality, camel, donkey, and horseback riding are also available.

pdp_listing_detail.p3_summary_title: An AWESOME house between Jerusalem & the Dead sea

sectioned_description.description:
The house is located in a small village, viewing the beautiful Judean Desert, the Dead Sea and Jerusalem.
The house is 15 mins drive from Jerusalem and 15 mins drive to the dead sea. The location is phenomenal!  Love hiking? walk to the water stream in the valley, or drive to Ein Zukim spring or to Ein Gedi. If you would like to visit Christian sites: The Good Samaritan, Qasr el Yahud and churches in Jerusalem or Jewish sites: The Western Wall, The old city, the Israel Museum and so much more.

There's a bakery and a mini supermarket also there are two restaurants and a pizza, burger and flafel shops
sectioned_description.house_rules:
- The bedroom upstairs is for the parents only
- Make sure to turn off AC before leaving the house
- Please do not wear shoes in the house
- Please make sure to be nice and not loud. This is a quite neighborhood

pdp_listing_detail.p3_summary_title: Desert Camping Israel -  Shepherd's Tent Dorm

sectioned_description.description:
Experience the tranquility of the desert and get a taste of warm Israeli hospitality.
Desert Camping Israel is a family run ecological campsite located in the heart of the Judean Wilderness.
​Our tent villages allow for our guests to intimately experience the wonders of the Desert.  Accommodations include options for single travelers,  couples, families and large groups.

Book a mattress in our original nomads' tent dormitory. Experience the Judean Desert first-hand. The large tent is comfortably set up for 20 single mattress, clean linen included, spread out on large mats and carpets. As an ecological campsite, we offer eco-friendly restrooms and showers.
אוהל הרועים

אוהל נוודי המדבר מתאים ללינה משותפת ל - 20  אורחים
ניתן לשכור מזרון בודד במתחם ללינה עם אורחים נוספים או לשכור את האוהל כולו ללינה קבוצתית

20  minutes drive to Jerusalem
20 minutes to the Dead Sea
Just minutes from some of the best hikes in Israel.
Less than an hour from Masada, Ein Gedi, the Jordan River, Qumran and much more. 
Natural oasis ( Ain Maboua, Ain Prat(URL HIDDEN)Camel rides, ATV self ride, jeep tour and more.

(URL HIDDEN)You can enjoy local food restaurants in our area, including spacial smoked meat restaurants, family bakery, flafel stand and pizza all about 5 min from us.

מסלולי טיול ומעיינות למיטבי לכת ולמשפחות
אטרקציות וחוויות מדברית
אוכל מקומי, מסעדות, פלאפל, פיצה ועוד.. במרחק דקות נסיעה מהחאן.

To get to our campsite please enter Waze: Desert Camping Israel, Kfar Adumim

sectioned_description.description:
Beit Driben is a beautifully decorated highly versatile 5 story complex with many apartments, rooms, halls & both public & private sitting areas. We are located in the industrial area of Kiryat Arba/Hevron. We are 1 hr from Jerusalem, 1/2 an hr from Bethlaham and 1 hr from Be'er Sheva. We are minutes away from the Cave of the Patriarchs where the patriarchs and matriarchs are burried. There are regular busses to and from Jerusalem & Be'er Sheva.

Beit Driben started as a factory and farm in the (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) s by Eddie Dribben (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) may he rest in peace. Eddie was a cowboy who came to Israel from Wyoming after serving in the US Military and lived in Israel ever since. His widow Sara Haya continues to live there. She is an artist who has designed and decorated this marvelous estate. 
We have hosted many events in our indoor halls and outdoor areas. 
People from all walks of life and backgrounds are welcome. We have an indoor pool that works all year round. 
We look forward to hosting you!
sectioned_description.house_rules:
- Please do not call after 3pm Friday until Sunday morning
- The price is on the base of a couple each additional bed is 100 nis
- we are in Orthodox Jewish establishment. Because of this we are not able to host people who do not keep from Friday at sundown until after Twilight Saturday night. This also applies during some Jewish holidays where electricity and driving are forbidden to us. 
- Smile required

sectioned_description.access: Living room, shared bathroom, garden and private room
sectioned_description.description:
Perfect place to stay when visiting friends, or family, or if you want to stay in a quite neighbourhood close to Jerusalem. You can stay here over shabat and join us in the se'udah (we keep kosher). Nice garden to enjoy the beautiful scenery

There is a room with a real bed, closet, table, and chair. Heating and cooling available in the room

Living room, shared bathroom, garden and private room

We are familiar in this neighbourhood. Any questions, feel free to contact us.

There is a valley close to our house with lots of animals and a beautiful place to walk. 

The city is surrounded on four sides by the Judean Desert and is linked to Jerusalem (20 minutes) and the Tel Aviv Metropolitan Area (50 minutes) via Highway 1.

There is a bus stop next to our door with buses practically going everywhere you need to go.

We have two beautiful children (4 and 6) that are always delighted to see new people. They are pretty quite during nights, so no need to worry about your rest.
sectioned_description.house_rules:
Guests can use the washingmachine for 40 NIS per washing-turn.

We keep Shabbat and Kashrut (food law), so as long as you respect this, you are more than welcome to join. If you want to join us in one of the Se'udot (meals) on shabbat, please let us know in advance and you are more than welcome to join.
Breakfast (Sunday - Friday): 25 ILS (NIS) per person per day
Shabbat-meals (Friday evening / Saturday): 50 ILS (NIS) per person per meal.
If you join us all the Shabbat meals, we give you the se'uda shlishit (Saturday evening meal) for free.

We keep "kosher" (so kitchen can only be used by observant or orthodox Jews who also are kosher.)
We can help you organize your trip.
Many in the area know English and will gladly help you travel around (hitchhiking)

sectioned_description.description: Shalom! Our house is located in one of the most beautiful places in the world. We are a family with 3 kids and a dog, living in a big private house with an amazing view to the Dead-Sea and to the desert mountains. We love to host and get to know people from all over the world. We live very close to Ein Gedi nature reserve (10 minutes driving), to Kedem hot springs, Massada National Park, and only an hour drive from Jerusalem.

primary_host.about:
Ich wohne schon 33 Jahre in Israel. Ich liebe dieses Land. Meine Kinder sind groß und zum Teil aus dem Haus. Daher habe ich viel Platz Gäste zu bewirten, was ich seid Juni 15 erfolgreich tue und mir sehr viel Freude macht. Ich selber reise nicht, doch jetzt hole ich mir die Welt in mein Haus. Ich mache gerne Hausmusik, mein Steckenpferd ist Nähen, lese gerne und unterhalte mich gerne über Philosophie, Religion, Psychologie und Politik.

I have lived in Israel over 33 years. I love this country. My children are grown up and have begun their own lives. Only my 22 year old son lives at home with me. Therefore, I have enough space to host guests. I’ve been doing this since June 2015 with great pleasure. I do not travel myself, but now I invite the world into my home. I like to play music. I like sowing, reading and talking about philosophy, religion, psychology and politics.
primary_host.name: Jehudith

sectioned_description.access: There are two rooms. One room has double and single beds. The other room has two beds that may be assembled. Also, you can use the bathroom with shower, living room, balcony, dining table and kitchen (the kitchen can only be used with my supervision because my home is kosher.  I do not have a separate apartment for my guests!
sectioned_description.description:
I offer peace u. Beauty of nature in the Judean Desert, overlooking the sunset over their mountains to Jerusalem. Easily accessible by bus u. Tramp, on the way Jerusalem-Dead Sea. Supermarket yet. I also speak German.

I have a large house. The kids have almost left home.  Sometimes, they  come for a visit, so I cannot always rent out my rooms to guests . Therefore, you have to make a request to book.

There are two rooms. One room has double and single beds. The other room has two beds that may be assembled. Also, you can use the bathroom with shower, living room, balcony, dining table and kitchen (the kitchen can only be used with my supervision because my home is kosher.  I do not have a separate apartment for my guests!

I do not work, so I am totally available for my guests.

I live in a Jewish religious site, with several synagogues, Mikve, Yeshiva, super mini-market, a beautiful view, quiet and clean air to breathe.

Es gibt ein Bus 216 von Jerusalem (Binjanei Ha Umma) bis direkt nach Mitzpe Jericho. Von hier gibt es Busse zum Toten Meer , nach Tiberias-See Genezareth und sogar nach Elat. Am Schabbat ruhen dir öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel. Man kann an der großen Hauptstraße arabische Taxis stoppen. . Wer mit einem Mietwagen kommt kann direkt vors Haus fahren, natürlich umsonst. Es ist bei dem Mieten eines Wagens zu empfehlen, solch eine Leihfirma zu wählen, die die Benutzung der B-Gebiete  (Westjordanland unter israelischer Militärbewachung) erlauben. (es kam vor, daß deshalb ein Gast absagte, der den Wagen von Deutschland aus mietete)

sectioned_description.access: The apartment is completely private with a separate entrance, porch, and all amenties.
sectioned_description.description:
Beautifully decorated and spacious apartment, with a breathtaking view of the mountains. Includes Jacuzzi, two showers, espresso machine, ample kitchen (kosher), sitting room, a quiet porch for the view, free wi-fi, cable TV and a romantic bedroom.

A romantic getaway excursion waits for you in the Holy Land, 15 minutes to Jerusalem, 15 minutes to the Dead Sea. We invest in the tiny details of comfort, design, and style to make your stay with us completely enjoyable and relaxing.

The apartment is completely private with a separate entrance, porch, and all amenties.

We offer you a variety of free tasty treats upon your arrival: chocolates, cookies in a sparkling clean apartment. We offer you the option to order (kosher) meals with an additional payment, if you choose.

The Desert Song apartments are located in a quiet town close to Jerusalem, with breathtaking desert views, possibilities for both walking and driving tours, surrounded by pleasant and helpful neighbors, with access to a synagogue, mikveh, local market, nearby restaurants and torah classes.

Public Transportation options include buses every two hours, to Jerusalem, the Dead Sea, and the North. Private taxi service is also available, but it is easiest to travel in this area with a private car.

If you're interested, you can sign up for Jeep tours, rappelling, dune buggy drives through the desert, Good Samaritan Mosaic Museum, camel rides, Kumran Caves, swimming in natural springs, and the traditional Baptismal Site of Jesus.
sectioned_description.house_rules: First and foremost, we request guests respect that this is a kosher kitchen, requiring that no pork, shellfish or other non kosher foods are handled in the kitchen and that on that from Friday Sundown to Saturday Sundown, the car must be parked outside the gates.  In addition, guests must cancel one week prior to the reservation.

sectioned_description.description:
Brand new, clean and comfortable suite in Modiin Illit ("Kiryat Sefer") with a small kitchen area (counter, sink, cabinets, fridge - no stove or oven) and a seating area. There is plenty of closet space and a bathroom with a shower. All linens (sheets, pillow cases, towels) are super clean and really comfy. It has a private entrance and is situated in a very quiet, private location, not facing the street. We are really friendly, American hosts and we're happy to answer any questions you have!

Modiin Illit is a religious Jewish city in the center of Israel, 30 minutes from Jerusalem, Bnei Brak, and Tel Aviv. On Saturday there is no driving, smoking or using phones in public.

There is plenty of free parking in the area, and busses all day to Jerusalem, Bnei Brak, Beit Shemesh, and Modiin.

Check-in on Saturdays is from 2 hours after the Sabbath ends (about 2.5 hours after sundown).

sectioned_description.description:
Desert View offers a private balcony with mountain (Website hidden by Airbnb) features air conditioning, free parking and free WiFi.It has a modern décor, a satellite flat-screen TV . It is composed of a separate bedroom, a living room with fully equipped kitchenette.

Rooms for couples and families
Services and amenities in your room:
Living room
Dining room
Kitchen
A kitchenette for light meals
Fridge & Freezer
Microwave
Stove

Located in Kfar Adumim, Jerusalem is 21 km from the Apartment Desert Views. The Dead Sea can be reached in a 15-minute drive.

Nofey Prat is located within the Scenic desert landscapes of the Judean Desert.

Below Nofey Prat you can find the flowing springs of the Prat River. The unique location of the Desert landscapes opens up spectacular views of ancient views, the northern ridge of Jerusalem, the Prat River and the Dead Sea landscape, all of which creates a pleasant feeling of eternal freedom.

Its location, between the Dead Sea and Jerusalem, allows access for many touristic sites and nature reserves.

photos.caption: No, it's not America; it's Israel ... but it was July 4th!

primary_host.about: Engineer, writer, musician.
primary_host.name: Bruce

sectioned_description.description:
I joke that the accommodations are "5-star" ...  minus 5-stars :-). 
Although rustic, it's comfortable. The bungalow might be worth a dime, but the view (of the Judean Wilderness) is worth a million dollars. Yet, it's just a 7-minute drive into Jerusalem!

There are public buses into and back from Jerusalem every couple/few hours.
sectioned_description.house_rules: I maintain a kosher kitchen. On Shabbat, there's not lighting a flame or cooking.

pdp_listing_detail.p3_summary_title: Central Israel, lovely room to rent

primary_host.about: Into guitars and anything musical, people, football (soccer).  Half artist, half scientist.  Fascinated by the world but not suffering from paralysis by analysis.  Goes with the flow.
primary_host.name: Antony

sectioned_description.access: It's a bedroom within a house, so you have access to the lounge, kitchen, guest bathroom, garden, etc.
sectioned_description.description:
Guest bedroom in new house, right in the center of Israel. A great touring base, only 20 mins from Tel Aviv beaches, 45 mins from Jerusalem, 1 hour from the Dead Sea. Great access to Rosh HaAyin, Petach Tikva, Hod HaSharon, Ra'anana, Herziliya, Ariel.

New, clean, house, great views and a garden.  Room has comfortable bed with memory foam mattress, clothes hanging facilities, ceiling fan, two windows, mosquito nets.

Beautiful, quiet town in the hills.  Located near Road 6 for great access to the north and south of the country.

It's a bedroom within a house, so you have access to the lounge, kitchen, guest bathroom, garden, etc.

Renting a car is advised. Public transport is sparse from the town itself, better from the main junction which is a hitch away (common in the area).

I will take some better photos when I have a chance, but I hope these give you an idea.  Feel free to ask any questions.
sectioned_description.house_rules: Honest, clean, tidy, polite please.  No cats, no smoking inside the house.
sectioned_description.name: Central Israel, lovely room to rent
sectioned_description.notes: I will take some better photos when I have a chance, but I hope these give you an idea.  Feel free to ask any questions.

photos.caption: Internal dinning table, at the open kitchen
Wide balcony with to sit with a glass of wine, and watch the amazing view of the Samaria
Happy living room, open space, ~50m sqr - very sunny, amazing view
Our back garden. You can BBQ!
A lot of corners to relax

primary_host.about:
I'm a lawyer, specialized in Real Estates
My husband is a digital media start up owner
We live in a beautiful apartment at Oranit, 35 min from Tel-Aviv, 10 min from train station.
I love design, nature, music, fashion, restaurants, and travelling.
primary_host.name: Mali

sectioned_description.description:
35 min from the big city Tel-Aviv, 10 min from Rosh-Ha'Ayin train station and right
ahead of the most beautiful view in the country, at the local council of Oranit.

3 rooms big apartment (96m sqr) with 1 bedroom with large bed + toilets, big bathroom with bath, equiped with washing machine + a dryer, another working room and a real huge space of living room and equiped kitchen (50m sqr).

A real big balcony (15m sqr) with big table for breakfast, lucnh and dinner ahead the most beautiful view of green mountains, fields and olive trees. And at the other side a private garden with wood deck, a lemon tree, place to have a barbecue and chillout (15m sqr).

The apartment is part of a 3 floors small building in a quiet and very friendly neighborhood. 

At the living room: 42 inches TV screen, receiver + speakers (for ipad/ipod)
At the kitchen: oven, microwave oven and a lot of kitchenware.
sectioned_description.house_rules: This is our home. Keep it clean, well organized like it was your home please.
sectioned_description.name: Beauty apartment, Breathtaking view

sectioned_description.description:
Looking for a personalized experience of Israel off the beaten track?
 we invite you to stay with us at Ruth's Home! 
Ruth's Home is situated in the "Galilee of Jerusalem", 
amidst vineyards, orchards and natural springs.
 Built with love and furnished with unique handmade wood art, 
Ruth's Home offers a space of inspiration and relaxation.
At Ruth's Home, 
we host couples for overnight stays,
 intimate boutique events 
unique workshops.
Two hour workshop with wood artist

pdp_listing_detail.p3_summary_title: Herod's View Spacious Villa near Jerusalem

sectioned_description.access:
All of our space is available for you. Up to 7 bedrooms, yard and balconies.
Free parking.
a small quiet playground is right next to the house.
sectioned_description.description:
Our house is large and comfortable, tastefully furnished and fits one family or more, children or adults.
The area is quiet and welcoming, enjoy full privacy and a beautiful view of the Judean desert and the Herodion.
We are located in Tekoa, a unique communal settlement about 20 minutes from Jerusalem.

A private house consists of 2 floors, 240 sq. meters.
 includes:
•7 bedrooms, 2 of them has a private bathroom
•large kosher kitchen, fully equipped. coffee machine, microwave and oven,  big refrigerator, kettle and all cooking utilities.
•dining table for up to 12 people.
•large play area for children
•linens and towels
•private Wifi
•air-conditioning
•laundry machine and dryer
• 2 bathrooms with bath tub, and 2 more toilet rooms
•a beautiful yard, porches and balcony with open view to Judean desert and the Herodion hill.

All of our space is available for you. Up to 7 bedrooms, yard and balconies.
Free parking.
a small quiet playground is right next to the house.

We will meet you on arrival and be available by phone or chat for any questions during your stay.

family-friendly space.
kosher kitchen, fully equipped.
sectioned_description.interaction: We will meet you on arrival and be available by phone or chat for any questions during your stay.
